General.Name: Tianjin Jiuri New Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Tianjin Jiuri New Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of UV curing and electronic chemical materials in China and internationally. It offers UV curing material, which includes radical photoinitiators, cationic photoinitiators, special monomers, and other photocurable materials that are used in various applications, such as photocurable coatings, inks, adhesives, 3D printing, composite materials, etc.; semiconductor material; and fine chemicals materials comprising ultraviolet absorbers, intermediates for pharmaceuticals and pesticides, monomers, raw materials for chemical materials, etc. Tianjin Jiuri New Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Tianjin, China.
General.Address: Building C, Second Gate, Tianjin, China, 300384
